name: Organic SEO Marketing
tagline: Los Angeles SEO and Internet Marketing Company
description:
Organic SEO Marketing is a Los Angeles based SEO firm that has been helping local businesses attain page one rankings for their respective industry keywords for over a decade now.
Our search engine optimization strategies include a variety of different link building techniques including EDU links, article writing and submission, directory registration, press releases and the use of Web 2.0 tools such as social bookmarking and interactive web presenters for your website.
